returnConnection(Connection) - Method in class mainProgram.ConnectionPool
a synchronized function that enables connection users (DBDAO classes) to return they're connection to the pool: (needs to be synchronized so that connections won't get lost between the users and the pool- there is a get function that does the opposite)
run() - Method in class mainProgram.DailyCouponExpirationTask
the run() method that executes the daily coupon update.
